content:
Elemental Analysis of All Investigated Phases<xref ref-type="table-fn" rid="t1fn2"></xref> Zn3mim5F0.35(OH)0.65 found (calc.) Zn3mim5ClH2O·0.74H2O Zn3mim5BrH2O·0.45H2O Zn3mim5OH C 38.6 (38.8) 35.3 (35.9) 35.3 (33.9) 38.5 (38.8) H 6.3 (4.2) 4.7 (4.3) 4.3 (4.0) 4.2 (4.2) N 22.6 (22.6) 20.8 (21.0) 20.5 (19.8) 22.5 (22.6) O n.d. (1.7) n.d. (4.3) 5.2 (3.3) n.d. (2.6) Zn (TG) 31.3 (31.7) 26.3 (29.3) 23.3 (27.7) 30.4 (31.7) F, Cl, Br 1.1 (1.1) 6.0 (5.3) 11.5 (11.3) - (-)

C, H, N, and O contents were determined by EA, zinc contents were determined via TG (Supporting Information, Table S10, Figure S11), and the contents of the halides were measured after precipitation with Ca­(OAc)2 for F and with AgNO3 for Cl and Br, respectively.

The C, H, N, and Zn contents were determined from material synthesized with zinc nitrate.
clean_text:
Table 1. Elemental Analysis of All Investigated Phases[^a][^b]

|       | Zn<sub>3</sub>mim<sub>5</sub>F<sub>0.35</sub>(OH)<sub>0.65</sub> found (calc.) | Zn<sub>3</sub>mim<sub>5</sub>ClH<sub>2</sub>O·0.74H<sub>2</sub>O | Zn<sub>3</sub>mim<sub>5</sub>BrH<sub>2</sub>O·0.45H<sub>2</sub>O | Zn<sub>3</sub>mim<sub>5</sub>OH[^1] |
|-------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| C     | 38.6 (38.8)                                                                 | 35.3 (35.9)                                                 | 35.3 (33.9)                                                 | 38.5 (38.8)                       |
| H     | 6.3 (4.2)                                                                   | 4.7 (4.3)                                                   | 4.3 (4.0)                                                   | 4.2 (4.2)                         |
| N     | 22.6 (22.6)                                                                 | 20.8 (21.0)                                                 | 20.5 (19.8)                                                 | 22.5 (22.6)                       |
| O     | n.d. (1.7)                                                                  | n.d. (4.3)                                                  | 5.2 (3.3)                                                   | n.d. (2.6)                        |
| Zn (TG)| 31.3 (31.7)                                                                 | 26.3 (29.3)                                                 | 23.3 (27.7)                                                 | 30.4 (31.7)                       |
| F, Cl, Br | 1.1 (1.1)                                                                 | 6.0 (5.3)                                                   | 11.5 (11.3)                                                 | - (-)                             |

[^a]: C, H, N, and O contents were determined by EA, zinc contents were determined via TG (Supporting Information, [Table S10, Figure S11](https://pubs.acs.org/doi/suppl/10.1021/acs.cgd.2c00174/suppl_file/cg2c00174_si_001.pdf)), and the contents of the halides were measured after precipitation with Ca­(OAc)<sub>2</sub> for F and with AgNO<sub>3</sub> for Cl and Br, respectively.
[^b]: The C, H, N, and Zn contents were determined from material synthesized with zinc nitrate.

Table 4. Change in the Lattice Parameters of Zn₃mim₅X Compounds with X = Br, Cl, F, or OH upon Cooling from 498 to 123 K

| change in lattice parameter | Zn₃mim₅F₁₋ₓ(OH)ₓ | Zn₃mim₅OH | Zn₃mim₅Cl | Zn₃mim₅Br |
|----------------------------|------------------|-----------|----------|----------|
| a                          | –0.88%           | –0.96%    | –2.60%   | –0.84%   |
| b                          | –1.72%           | –1.32%    | –1.39%   | –0.93%   |
| c*                         | +0.32%           | +0.23%    | +1.18%   | –0.11%   |
| V                          | –2.27%           | –2.03%    | –2.83%   | –1.86%   |
